title.narrative: STRENGHTENING POLICY FRAMEWORK TO SOCIAL PROTECTION SYSTEM

description.narrative: Government institutions have increased capacity to strengthen the legal and policy framework for the integrated protection of children and the social protection of children and families, in compliance with the CRC, CEDAW and CRPD., which contributes to Adolescent Empowerment, Child Poverty / Public Finance For Children, Children With Disabilities, Early Childhood Development, Gender Discriminatory Roles And Practices, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Social Protection. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2022, children, particularly those in situations of disadvantage, benefit from coordinated policies and programmes, have increased access to integrated social services, and have their rights increasingly monitored.

participating-org.narrative: DEFENSORIA DE LOS DERECHOS DE LA NI

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Government institutions have increased capacity to strengthen the legal and policy framework for the integrated protection of children and the social protection of children and families, in compliance with the CRC, CEDAW and CRPD.

description.narrative: UNICEF advocated for children's rights in compliance with CRC during the discussions of different draft bills that affect children's lives at the Congress. UNICEF continued to support the implementation of the National Action Plan for Children and Adolescents 2018-2025, and to generate evidence for decision-making. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:12/02/2020

title.narrative: The coordination mechanism designed to the social protection system aimed at children is intersectoral.

baseline.value: The intersectoral coordination mechanism designed to the social protection system aimed at children, includes the Ministries of Social Development and Health.

target.value: 2022:The intersectoral coordination mechanism designed to the social protection system aimed at children, includes the Ministries of Social Development, Health, Education and Justice & Human Rights.

title.narrative: Model implemented at the local level aimed at the comprehensive protection of the rights of children, which includes model of parenting programme.

baseline.value: There are some models implemented at the local level aimed at the comprehensive protection of the rights of children, but they have not been either documented or assessed in their effectiveness.

target.value: 2022:There is a model designed, implemented, validated and evaluated in 3 municipalities, which is aimed at the comprehensive protection of the rights of children.

title.narrative: Cost-effectiveness study on CCTs targeted to families implemented within the framework of social protection.

baseline.value: There is no cost-effective study on CCTs for families within the framework of social protection.

target.value: 2020:There is one cost-effective study on CCTs for families within the framework of social protection.
